text.snippet: Learn 5 steps to help you get paid in nine days or less
text.paragraph1: When it comes to billing, 30-day terms can be a thing of the past. With the added collection period, those terms can put a strain on your cash flow.
text.paragraph2: Fortunately, you can take a few simple steps to get the money you're owed in nine days or fewer. Read "5 Ways to Get Paid 5 Times Faster" for tips to better handle your receivables.
text.quickTip: Get paid instantly on any smartphone, iPad or tablet, and you'll pay just a small percentage of the transaction.
